Package com.cmas.controller

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.controller.SuggestionManager
public class SuggestionManager extends Object
Controller class that manages operations related to suggestions, including adding, updating, and removing suggestions. Additionally, it tracks that acceptance status for the suggestion and also add points for those with suggestions accepted. This class interacts with the database to store and retrieve suggestion data.
Since:
2023-11-14

  • Constructor Details

    • SuggestionManager

      public SuggestionManager()

  • Method Details

    • getSuggestion

      public static Suggestion getSuggestion(UUID suggestionUID)
      Retrieves a suggestion based on the provided UUID.
      Parameters:
      suggestionUID - The UUID of the suggestion to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The suggestion associated with the UUID.

    • addSuggestion

      public static void addSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion, CampCommMember student)
      Adds a new suggestion and generate a new UUID for the suggestion. Tags the suggestion with the provided Camp Committee Member (student).
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The suggestion to be added.
      student - The Camp Committee Member (student) adding the suggestion.

    • updateSuggestion

      public static void updateSuggestion(String suggestion, UUID suggestionUID)
      Updates the content of a suggestion based on the provided suggestion UUID.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The new content of the suggestion.
      suggestionUID - The UUID of the suggestion to update.

    • removeSuggestion

      public static void removeSuggestion(UUID suggestionUID, CampCommMember student)
      Removes a suggestion from the system based on the provided suggestion UUID. Also removes the association from the Camp Committee Member.
      Parameters:
      suggestionUID - The UUID of the suggestion to remove.
      student - The Camp Committee Member (student) associated with the suggestion.

    • setStatus

      public static void setStatus(UUID suggestionUID, boolean status)
      Sets the acceptance status of a suggestion. Additionally, awards points to the creator of the suggestion if it is accepted.
      Parameters:
      suggestionUID - The UUID of the suggestion to update.
      status - The status indicating whether the suggestion is accepted.

    • printSuggestionDetails

      public static void printSuggestionDetails(UUID suggestionUID)
      Prints the details of a suggestion.
      Parameters:
      suggestionUID - The UID of the suggestion to be printed.
